column8: As a project manager, I want a complete SRS so that all stakeholders have a clear understanding of functional and non-functional requirements.
As a system architect, I want to design UML diagrams, system architecture, and ERD so the development team has a clear blueprint for implementation.
As an Admin, I want to assign roles (Tenant, Agent, Admin) so that only authorized users can access sensitive features.
As a tenant, I would like to schedule viewing appointments with a leasing agent to view a property.

column3: Digital Lease Agreement Generation & Electronic Signing
column8: As a Tenant, I want the system to generate digital lease agreements automatically that I can electronically sign so I don’t need physical paperwork.
As an Admin, I want automated alerts sent to tenants & staff for overdue payments so that reminders don’t have to be manually sent.

column3: Bulk Discount and Multi-Unit Billing Logic
column8: As a Tenant leasing multiple units, I want the system to automatically apply discount logic so that my billing reflects accurate total charges.
As an Admin, I want to manage multiple mall properties so each mall has its own inventory of store units.
As an Admin, I want the system to track lease start/end dates and alert users before expiry so renewals are not missed.
As a Tenant, I want to access system features from mobile devices so that I can manage store leases and requests from anywhere.

column3: System Shall Recover from Partial Failures
column8: As a system user, I want every transaction (booking, billing, lease signing) to be completed fully or rolled back so that no data gets corrupted.
As a QA Engineer, I want automated testing with measurable coverage so I can verify system reliability.
As a Tenant, I want to be able to search properties for viewing and search results to load within 2 seconds so the system feels fast.
As a user, I want all booking/billing transactions to complete fully or not at all so the database remains safe.

column3: Import & Manage Utility Usage Data for Monthly Bill
column8: As Admin Staff, I want to input/import utility data so consolidated billing reflects real consumption.
As a Tenant, I want to be charged for misuse-related maintenance to ensure accountability.
As a student developer, I want to optimize features, fix bugs, and document learnings in a portfolio so I can showcase it professionally.
